data.name: Space Fox Kimi and the Interstellar Fortress
data.detailed_description:
In the long, grueling war with the United Bunny Federation, the Galactic Foxian Empire is looking for any advantage they can get. Kimi and her crewmates on board the GFE Agedashi comes across a strange installation built on top of a large asteroid... What could be waiting for them inside the Interstellar Fortress?

This is a short silly side story to the Space Fox Kimi main series made for the very first Extra Credits Game Design Jam over two days. It is non-canon and shouldn't be taken seriously.



Arrow keys to move/select
Z to interact/confirm
X for menu/go back
Hold SHIFT to run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
